mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.flash_promotion_price, r.flash_promotion_count, r.flash_promotion_limit, r.flash_promotion_id, r.flash_promotion_session_id, r.product_id, r.sort, g.`id` g_id, g.`name`, g.goods_sn, g.retail_price, SUM(p.number) p_stock FROM young_seckill_promotion_product_relation r LEFT JOIN young_goods g ON r.product_id = g.id LEFT JOIN young_goods_product p ON p.goods_id = g.id WHERE r.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} AND r.flash_promotion_session_id = #{flashPromotionSessionId} GROUP BY p.goods_id ORDER BY r.sort DESC

SELECT ps.id, ps.`name`, COUNT(pr.flash_promotion_session_id) product_count, ps.start_time,ps.end_time,ps.`status` FROM young_seckill_promotion_session ps LEFT JOIN young_seckill_promotion_product_relation pr ON ps.id = pr.flash_promotion_session_id WHERE pr.flash_promotion_id = #{promotionId} AND ps.deleted=0 GROUP BY pr.flash_promotion_session_id ORDER BY ps.start_time ASC
